alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 29 at 7:35PM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible at 5000 feet with 14 to 30 inches above 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...For the Sierra Nevada above 5000 feet. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
